full_summary:
## Tender Announcement
### Title
National Capital Region (NCR) - Temporary Help Services against the Supply Arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR)

### Reference Number
CB-9065-88533696

### Tender Overview

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement
**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
**Procurement Category**: Service (SRV)
**Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
**Regions of Opportunity**: National Capital Region (NCR)

### Tender Description
The Department of National Defense (DND) is seeking Temporary Help Services for the National Capital Region (NCR). This service requirement is only open to supply arrangement holders under EN578-172870 who are qualified under the following streams and categories:

* Computer Application Support

A list of eligible supply arrangement holders has been invited to submit a proposal:

* ARTEMP Personnel Services Inc.
* AZUR Human Resources Limited
* BiR Consulting Inc.
* BRYCA Solutions Inc.
* Eagle Professional Resources Inc.
* Fanar Enterprise Solutions Inc.
* Integra Networks Corporation
* IPSG Technology Inc.
* MAKWA Resourcing Inc.
* Malarsoft Technology Corporation
* Maverin Inc.
* Protak Consulting Group Inc.
* TEKsystems Canada Corp./Société TEKSystems Canada
* Tiree Facility Solutions Inc.
* TRM Technologies Inc.

### Security Requirement
A Reliability security clearance is required for resources.

### Tender Documents
To obtain a copy of the tender documents, please visit the [Canadabuys website](http://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9065/s4638386---method-2---rfp-%28english-version-%28006.pdf](http://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9065/s4638386---method-2---rfp-%28french-version-%28003.pdf)).

### Contact Information
Department of National Defense
CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca (Email)
613-971-795 (Phone)
